title: How Retailers Can Improve Self-Checkout
sub_head: The technology has gotten better. But it still has a long way to go.
body:
Cashier or self-checkout? Thatâ€™s the difficult question consumers often face when they finish shopping. The self-checkout line may be shorter, but given all the things that could go wrong, it may not be faster.
Retailers, looking to reduce labor costs, are determined to make that decision a lot easier.
